export function ActionBtn(props){ const {tweet, action} = props const className = props.className ? props.className : 'btn btn-primary btn-sm' return action.type === 'like'? : null } export function Tweet(props){ const {tweet} = props const className = props.className ? props.className : 'col-10 mx-auto col-md-6' return

{tweet.id} - {tweet.content}

}
